website_summaries.verdict: Made for classroom use, this electric pencil sharpener is heavy-duty and a favorite of teachers.
pros: Sharpener stops automatically when the pencil is done sharpening
Offers the ability to sharpen pencils of several different sizes and shapes
Sharpens nicely, but not dangerously sharp
Can handle a lot of usage without failing
Includes suction cups on the bottom for secure placement on your table or desk
cons: This model tends to be more expensive than others on the market
It is not for use with colored pencils

customer_reviews.title: How do I contact X Acto
customer_reviews.text: This is my THIRD pencil sharpener, of the exact same model. My parents bought one as a gift when I went back in the classroom in 2016, bought a used off Amazon in 2017, and bought again new in box from Amazon in February of 2018. All three are no longer working. I cannot figure out what is happening, but having 3 sharpeners with almost $100 invested and none working is a bit extreme. I have smaller classes, so it cannot be an overuse issue. I have tried blowing out the wheels/blades and still cannot get it to work. Any advice?
customer_reviews.author: twinsintally

customer_reviews.title: Junk - AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: 1) Pencil has to be inserted 4-5 inches before the (unbalanced) cutter starts 2) Sharpener does not stop when LED lights as advertised 3) Led does not illuminate until the pencil is 1/3 gone 4) The pencil; does not get centered and wobbles therefore not sharpened correctly. 5) Sending back for refund 6) AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener was brand-new when we received it, but acts like it is already dull. The wood on the pencil comes out looking as if an angry beaver has chewed on it. Workers, it’s almost impossible to get the point centered on the pencil, always chewing off more from one side. Maybe this is a side effect of trying to have one sharpener for many sizes of pencil. I have tried applying less pressure, but that will just cause the lead to break. The blue LED is just a useless gimmick, because the pencils are already sharp before the LED turns on. The pencils in the photos were new, never sharpened before. Overall, I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A N

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife who is a teacher, bought this pencil sharpener in June for the upcoming school year. When she opened the box it was noted that the wheel that is used for selecting the size of the pencil to be sharpened was not attached. I tried to reattach the wheel abs could not determine how to do it so that it would stay attached. Unfortunately the sharpener is now beyond the return window. Needless to say, she is not happy with this product and yes, the item should have been inspected when received so we are to blame for not being able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: TOSOC7

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a teacher and her classroom
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved the first Exacto pencil sharpener so much she bought another! After originally buying one for her classroom she was so happy with it that she bought one for the home office. The sharpener works quickly to get your pencil super sharp. It also shuts off when it senses your pencil is sharp enough. According to her it's a lifesaver for her 6th grade class of 30. Shes had the first one for a few years now so we know its durable too. It is a little loud for my liking but the fact it takes only a couple of seconds to fully sharpen a pencil makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: The Siegel Family

customer_reviews.title: Finicky getting normal pencils started, but still sharpens well.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the enlarged opening end of the cutting blades to fit larger pencils, the average pencil starts off at an angle and creates a little difficulty for the kids to use. For an adult, it can be a little bit annoying, but it functions well and sharpens nicely. Overall, I think it was a good buy. We will have to see how long it lasts. My previous Boston pencil sharpener lasted over 15 years and I was impressed. It is no longer in production, so I'm giving the X-ACTO a shot at the title for longest lasting. What's the worst that could happen? Don't answer that!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Keep colored pencils out and it keeps on trucking
customer_reviews.text: After the tenth time I had to put in a ticket for a broken pencil sharpener in my classroom I bought this myself. I've been using it for years, hundreds or students, thousands of pencils, and it keeps on ticking. I don't allow colored pencils and I've been told by other staff with the same model that it will eventually clog up from the waxy leftovers that result if you let students use this on those kinds of pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Must be defective from X-Acto  but Amazon stood tall!
customer_reviews.text: This unit was a piece of junk. First time I ever had to return an item to Amazon. Simply did not work, must be defective but still disappointing. Since I was afraid maybe they are all junk I asked for my money back. I paid a lot of money figuring it would be a good unit to have. Not so much!!! None of the advertised functionality- auto stop , light to indicate pencil was done worked. It just kept chewing up brand new pencils down to nubs. On the good side ,Amazon refunded my money with 24 hours after I sent it back. Kudos to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: NPlatz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sharpener but large
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Sharpener. Hard to get excited about a pencil sharpener without looking like a total dork but here goes. This thing is big but it does a fantastic job, It creates a perfectly sharpened pencil quickly and stops at just the right point in time. I haven't yet need to empty the waste receptacle but it holds a lot. One could probably sharpen more than a hundred pencils before it got full. If you have the space for this sharpener, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: Fred E. Callison

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a table saw
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tank. I was not expecting the size, which is my fault. I should have read the dimensions. It's so loud. It feels like it's a wood chipper and it's going to inhale the pencil, but it doesn't. I like the point it makes, though every time I remove the pencil, a plume of shavings shoots out like confetti. It creates a bit of a mess. I'll likely be returning it because of how loud it is. But I do like the pencil size dial.
customer_reviews.author: P. W.

customer_reviews.title: It really is a breeze and I love how many options you have regarding pencil size
customer_reviews.text: This one is a BEAST. I didn't realize how large it is but it gets any job done that I have thrown at it. I have used it for my regular pencils, Colored pencils, Chalk pencils, Eyebrow pencils and a few more. It really is a breeze and I love how many options you have regarding pencil size. I have owned this for a few months and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: jrobin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived repackaged- possible return resold to me?
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work fine, but I'm really puzzled why it wasn't even put in a box, just arrived all taped up, loosely repackaged on my porch. Hesitant to trust it, but it appears unused. If you're going to repackage and resell something- at least make sure it fits back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: D. Raedeke

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in August so I'm pretty sure it's too late to return
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August so I'm pretty sure it's too late to return. I plugged it in on Friday to sharpen pencils for my class... it doesn't sharpen. This sharpener decides when your pencil is sharp and then it stops......... even if the pencil is not sharp. When I put the pencil back in to continue sharpening the blue light comes on and the blade will not spin bc thee sharpener has decided that my full pencil IS in fact sharp. Such a shame bc it was pricey and a big load of you know what. If I could give it 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Carluccio

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - broke in a week
customer_reviews.text: Great idea - blue light goes on so that students know when pencil is sharpened. Worked great for a couple weeks. Then it broke - blue light now goes on when pencil isn't sharpened. No big deal, except that the sharpener also stops when the blue light goes on so now it takes students twice as long to sharpen a pencil because they have to keep pulling the pencil out, wait for light to go off, and then try again to sharpen pencil.
customer_reviews.author: KMF13

customer_reviews.title: Won't last 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great until the sensor continually went on and would not allow a pencil to fully sharpen unless you repeatedly pulled the pencil out and put it back in numerous time. Lasted about 18 months before it started happening, for the price I am very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, even for home use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for home schooling 2 Kindergarteners after the schools shut down for the Covid pandemic. Love this sharpener: has several pencil size openings, low noise and a huge shavings collector. Best feature is the light indicator that appears when the pencil is sharpened... my kids know when their pencil is completely sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bommarito

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters teacher has this model in her classroom and when I've volunteered to assist her it's been a lifesaver helping all the very young children keep up with their school work when a pencil needs sharpening, you don't have to wonder if you got it sharp enough or not, when it's at the perfect sharpened point the light indicator notifies you. Love that better than any others, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: jacci

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It sharpens the lead to such a fine point it breaks constantly. And, the unit overheats virtually every time I sharpen a pencil. (Yes, multiple pencils--new, used, #2 et al--were tried.) Given the X-ACTO name, I wonder it has suffered from some over-engineering. (We're sharpening pencils, not grinding metal!) $70 down the drain for 2 (home schooling in COVID!).
customer_reviews.author: jules4

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! As a hard working teacher, I am always looking for a good pencil sharpener. I am skeptical of all of them. They tear up, stop working, & simply don't sharpen pencils. Today, I got my sharpener and I was so excited. It has this cute blue light that comes on once you are done sharpening the pencil. It sharpens to a perfect point, even on the cheapest pencils. Today is just day one. If my opinion changes, I will update my review!!! *Please mark my review as helpful if it did indeed help you make a decision with your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JuicyFruit1913

customer_reviews.title: So many goodie bag pencils!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my kindergartener kept coming home from school and parties with unsharpened pencils. The mini manual sharpeners just ruined pencils so a friend recommended this XACTO sharpener. It came ready to use out of the box, was simple and quick to sharpen pencils of many sizes perfectly. Well worth the money if you've got an abundance of pencils around.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna W.

customer_reviews.title: This sharpener works great! We have had this sharpener for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener works great! We have had this sharpener for a few months now and use it to sharpen a moderate amount of pencils each week, and have had no problems with it! It has a solid and sturdy build and feel to it, yet doesn't take up a lot of room on a counter! We would highly recommend this sharpener to any one who needs a really reliable and sturdy sharpener for sharpening pencils, no matter how small or large the need is, whether you sharpen just a few pencils here and there, or are sharpening a much larger supply of pencils. Great for household or personal use!
customer_reviews.author: KWB

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the world's greatest sharpener. Every pencil gets weapons-grade sharp every time! This baby is suuuuuper quick and sharpens a gallon-size bag of classroom pencils in no time. Also, the little blue indicator light rocks my word. Just stop reading reviews now and buy this. I guarantee you'll be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Classroom Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about this sharpener is that the dial on the front turns too easily. Its just a little annoying. Wish it had firmer clicks so kids would be less tempted to mess with it. Otherwise, it sharpens pencils and colored pencils fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Monty

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in January 2018. Didn't get used in June or July. Started using it again in mid August, but then it burnt out in November. Let's see, that's about nine months this sharpener lasted. It did a great job while it worked. I can't return it and I don't have time to fiddle with it to see if I could fix it on my own. My last X-ACTO ProX lasted about two years. I'm not buying this brand anymore. Really stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine4us

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used for classrooms
customer_reviews.text: Best I've used for classrooms. This is my third one because a student shoved a pencil in backwards and messed up the blade on the first one. After shopping for the blades, I found that I could just replace the whole sharpener for a little more. That one onlt lasted me a year so now I don't allow students to use it at all. Then I purchased again and received a lemon that quit after a couple of days. Of course Amazon was great on replacing it so no complaints on that at all. The new one works just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Pekins

customer_reviews.title: Teachers Beware- sensor does not work
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this for my classroom. Unfortunately, after a couple of weeks of use (not a lot of use, mind you), the sensor that tells the machine to stop sharpening has malfunctioned and will not sharpen pencils completely unless the pencil is removed from the slot, and re-entered multiple times. In a classroom setting, I do not have time for that. I had purchased an X-Acto about 3 years ago, and it just recently went out, which is why I purchased a new one. This is particular product is not fitting for teachers or the classroom setting.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for replacement unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. First, one for my daughter's teacher and it was so well appreciated (the entire class wrote me a thank-you), I bought one for home for my kids. After 14 months the second unit stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jim

customer_reviews.title: I love it and wonder if I'll ever go back to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 different electric pencil sharpeners in my classroom over the past 5 years. This is the first one that has held up for a full school year and is still going! I don't allow colored pencils to be sharpened. I only have one student who is assigned the job of pencil manager who uses it. Perhaps all of these factors have helped it survive. I love it and wonder if I'll ever go back to a manual sharpener. Would DEFINITELY buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Endless Summer

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Must Have
customer_reviews.text: So far the best pencil sharpers I have ever used/purchased. I have only had this pencil sharpener for about a month now and it is phenomenal!!! The fact that it is still working with the use it gets weekly in the classroom is telling of it’s awesome abilities!! I have faith it will stand the test of time...unlike other pencil sharpers that I have purchased in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sharpener for classroom use. It has all the features that should help it last. Unfortunately, one day it just stopped working. There is no logical reason for it. I understand that it has a 10 yr warranty but there's no information and I can't see myself returning this product to the company as it isn't worth the hassle. Very dissappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten classroom approved
customer_reviews.text: Kindergarten classroom approved. This sharpener has been running strong since the beginning of September in a Kindergarten classroom. The kids love the blue light when their pence is fully sharpened. They have all become pencil perfectionists at making sure they have a perfect writing tip. This is my first year teaching so we will see how many years this sharpener lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is so good!
customer_reviews.text: As a homeschool mom, I'm always looking for things to equip our homeschool that are sturdy and kid proof. This sharpener is wonderful. It advertises as quiet---ehhh it's ok--not super quiet. But everything else they detailed was 100% right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great...until it doesn't!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered 2 new sharpeners for my classroom because when they're working they are quiet and efficient. The problem is that I have a boneyard with 3 of these sharpeners. After a short period of time (from 3 mos to 7 mos) they quit sharpening....will begin to sharpen, but senses it is fully sharpened....blue light comes on and it will not finish the job. I have thoroughly cleaned them - stopping short of disassembling to no avail. I wish that there was a way to bypass the shut-off sensor. Any suggestions from X-ACTO?
customer_reviews.author: Bob Poe

customer_reviews.title: X-ACTO ProX Classroom Pencil Sharpener Is solid (Plastic Enclosure)
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the X-ACTO ProX Classroom Electric Pencil Sharpenerfor a couple of weeks so far, and have no buyer's remorse. I guess, as electric sharpeners go, it is a luxury limo compared to the usual run of the mill ones. The unit is weighted (the base) so it is more stable than it might appear in the pictures. Like I said, no complaints... will take time to see how the blades wear.
customer_reviews.author: LaRoo

customer_reviews.title: Best sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many pencil sharpeners in my 7 years as a teacher. This is by far the best! I sharpen pencils several times a day for up to 20 students at a time. Each time, these pencils come out perfectly sharpened. It doesn't make the lead fall out. It's a perfect sharpen each time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Auto-Stop Never Stops
customer_reviews.text: This item is supposed to have "Flyaway cutter system stops cutter automatically when pencil is sharp". The little blue light comes on, but the sharpener never stops automatically and it would happily chew through an entire pencil if you let it. Very disappointed in the quality at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stefanelli

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens pencils quickly without breaking the lead!
customer_reviews.text: After not having pencil sharpener for some time, I'm enjoying how quickly my pencils get sharp. I like the adjustments for the different pencil diameters. I had thought that this sharpener made adjustments for very sharp or not quite so sharp . . . but that must have been the other one I looked at when exploring them. All in all, an excellent sharpener!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good for ONE YEAR.
customer_reviews.text: The X-ACTO TeacherPro was recommended to me by another classroom teacher. I loved it when I first started using it and it was all the rave with the students in my class. It worked flawlessly for one year. Unfortunate, the "SmartStop" function is always on when sharpening pencils rendering the sharpener useless. I would recommend this but for only one years use for ~50 dollars, there are much better sharpeners you can buy for less. I would try and send it in for warranty, but we as teachers all know that waiting isn't the best option when 28 10 year olds need to sharpen their pencils. Going out to buy a new sharpener today, it won't be an X-ACTO though.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Working great in a second grade classroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who is a teacher and sharpens tons of pencils everyday. I bought it mainly for the warranty but when I sent in the warranty card the company had moved and it was returned to me. I checked online and they seem to have changed names so I think the warranty is a lost cause. The sharpener has lasted over 3 months now and is still going strong this is the usually the end of life for some other sharpeners she has tried.
customer_reviews.author: Brianlaw19

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I have been teaching for about 15 years now, and have been using the same pencil sharpener in my room for far too long. After years of watching students grind their pencils into a nub I decided it was time to upgrade. This instant cutoff feature on this unit works perfectly. It actually shocks students the first time it happens because they think they have broken it. There are six openings for use with multiple sized pencils, and the shavings trap may take about three years to fill up because of its size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Seigler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Stop wasting your money on manual and other pencil sharpeners. This is the best because it is not battery operated and you have options on what size pencil to sharpen. WIN AND WIN!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: My students love it so much that I got kids and teachers ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this sharpener for my classroom two years ago. My students love it so much that I got kids and teachers from other classrooms come to my room to sharpen their pencils. The light turns blue to tell you your pencil is sharpened so kids can't stand there for too long... great sharpener. I just wish it made less noise but that's probably impossible so 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: shirly

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pencil sharpener. I like that there are multiple size options and that it has a large capacity for the shredded pencil bits. I don't like that some times it seems to take almost a minute to sharpen a pencil. I also don't care for the fact that the bottom catch drawer only allows it to function because a super thin piece of plastic sticks in a small hole allowing the machine to operate. This broke off the first time I emptied the drawer. So now I have it shoved in the hole so the thing will work. I would expect better from a pencil sharpener in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: MDJ

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: As a former teacher (now administrator), I had one of these in my 5th grade classroom. We called it the Mercedes Benz of pencil sharpeners! The blue light that comes on to indicate the pencil is fully sharpened is helpful and helps prevent kids from taking TOO long at the sharpener. I have had it now for 5 years and it still working. I purchased this one for my house. We have 4 school-aged children. They love it too! It is easy to empty, works quickly and quietly. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Coit

customer_reviews.title: My wife is a prolific color pencil user. She ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a prolific color pencil user. She has used this for 8 months and loves it. She is a retired school teacher and used this model for years in her classroom without complaint. She did say you can't run it non stop over long periods of time or it will overheat. But she used many models of these over 38 years in the classroom and said that all models will heat under extra heavy useage.
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter For Christ

customer_reviews.title: Sharpen pencils
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use. It has only one default and that is it will leave wood on one side if you don't stop sharpening and turn it over and then continue. Other wise you get half lead, half wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pencil sharpener. It handles a wide variety of pencil diameters, and has a little blue light to tell you when the pencil is sharp. Plenty of power. It is surprisingly large: 7-8" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Danner

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to empty and holds a lot of the shavings
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a long time for a GOOD PENCIL SHARPENER and I found it, it is just right I need to sharpen pencils all the time because I use the adult coloring books and use colored pencils. I really love it thank you I don’t need to buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: gama

customer_reviews.title: This thing is ridiculous cool compared to the previous piece of junk we had ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ridiculous cool compared to the previous piece of junk we had before. It powers through brand new pencils as well as colored pencils. Well worth the extra $$ if you know you'll be sharpening a lot of pencils. The kids in one of my children's classes rotate sharpening pencils for each other so there are times when about a 100 pencils need to be sharpened in a short amount of time. Our previous pencil sharpener struggled mightily with this task. This one saves tons of time and with how fast it sharpens and how big the clippings bin is. Very pleased with this sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Still works great after 7 YEARS of classroom use!
customer_reviews.text: Edited July 15, 2018: 7 years and it still works great! I still have former students come to my room to sharpen their pencils while they are in class. Everyone knows I have the best pencil sharpener! 😂 Original review: High school students have been using this in my math classroom for 2 years. It's quieter than some of the other pencil sharpeners I've used. Occasionally gets jammed if the point of the pencil breaks off in the machine or the shavings container is misaligned but I've had no problems clearing it. Sometimes people come by my classroom to use it. Would buy again if it broke down, but it hasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Electric Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over 2.5 months. It is a vast improvement over manual pencil sharpeners. Plus, I like that I don't have to hunt for it. No one is going to misplace this or not return it to a drawer, shelf, desk, etc. It does not chew up the cheapo pencils either. It sharpens all pencils to a nice smooth point. No more broken leads and having to clean out broken tips from blade. Very happy with this product!!! I will update after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Moonflower

customer_reviews.title: lasted in a school library for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for an elementary school library two years ago, and it just died now after yeoman service. Considering the wear on it, two years was a very good run: this sharpener was used on 10 to 50 pencils a day for nearly two years straight (including summer school). It was fast, and created very sharp points without grinding too much of the pencil. The light was also very useful for letting students know when the sharpening was done. We tried several other sharpeners for the library, but they couldn't take the strain and broke after a few months. This product gave terrific service right up until its death, and I am buying the exact same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Grade Teacher Approved
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sharpener! The automatic stop is wonderful! It makes it easier for first graders to use. It has withstood first grade mayhem so far and seems to last well. I’m also protecting it somewhat like pirate treasure, but that’s because this thing is gold!
customer_reviews.author: aderynbach

customer_reviews.title: this sharpener is AMAZING. And if you're a teacher
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I sharpen about 150 pencils a week. This pencil sharpener has made me WANT to sharpen pencils. I won't even let my students touch it because I'm afraid they'll break it (like the other 12 tiny ones I had..) Point blank, this sharpener is AMAZING. And if you're a teacher, it's absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I had another X-Acto pencil sharpener and it was awful but after reading the reviews here on this one, I decided to give it a go and another chance. We LOVE this pencil sharpener! Love how it gives you a blue light indicating when the pencil is sharpened and stops the motor and love how it has different settings for different sized pencils (though we haven't used that feature much). My kids enjoy using their colored pencils for those wildly popular coloring books!
customer_reviews.author: Jane C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Classroom Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener brand is the go-to for classrooms. It is very durable and reliable. It sharpens very quickly! One feature that I like in this model is an indicator light showing when the pencil is sharpened. This is especially helpful for my hearing impaired students.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Put through the abuse of being used on a daily basis by ~ 140 - 8th grade students. Did last quite a bit, but did break after about two years of use. Overall I did like the sharpener and plan on shopping for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Bio Grl

customer_reviews.title: It's BIG!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big pencil sharpener. Love the automatic off function once pencil get to a sharpened point. Only thing is that you have to rotate the pencil to get even shave or one side will be sharpened and the other side will still have wood attached. Lovely sharpener though.
customer_reviews.author: Sketchzombie

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting great product!
customer_reviews.text: After 8 years, it is still working well. It saved me lots of time on sharpening all kids' pencils and color pencils. Just bought the second one, for using in another room. To avoid the over-sharpening, the light indicator is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Broken already =(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November. It has not even been three full months and it already stopped working. I am a teacher so it does get used weekly, but as a music teacher I don't use the sharpener daily, like other teachers would. I rarely let the students use it and thought the light a brilliant idea to let the students not over sharpen their pencils. It sharpened pencils quickly and fairly quietly prior to it breaking. Unfortunately, I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: thimset

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating, not a long lasting product!
customer_reviews.text: Had to have it replaced by the company, same thing with the other model I bought. The customer service was great and they sent me a replacement for free. All I had to do was take a picture and recycle it, but I'm weary that two models, and my neighboring teachers' sharpeners as well, all had motor failures within just a few months. We don't bulk sharpen, just as the students need to here and there. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Best sharpener EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sharpener I've ever owned! I've taught 9 years and hated pencil sharpening, now with as speedy and quiet as this one is, I can't wait to sharpen each day. It takes no time at all to have a class set sharpened and ready! I actually bought my whole team one after they saw mine!
customer_reviews.author: DSirmans

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive, large size and fast cutters.
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens very quickly, ready for a new school year. We will see how long this one lasts! My old Panasonic lasted many years, this one looks like it should do the same or better. Very large shaving tray and sounds like a strong motor. Nice touch with the multiple sizes so it can handle a variety of pencil types. I already have several other teachers asking about where I got it! Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Paradis

customer_reviews.title: I am not one to leave bad reviews, but two months and it breaks
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener was delivered to me at the end of October. I started using it in my class room of third graders in November. We do not sharpen pencils everyday. I used it in November and December (which we are out a week in November and two weeks out in December.) Came back to school and used it for a day or two, now it will not work. I have tried contacting someone to make it right, but no one had responded. I am not one to leave bad reviews, but two months and it breaks? This is supposed to be the #1 Teacher Recommended Sharpener. This teacher is not happy with the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of pencil sharpeners
customer_reviews.text: We use these in the PTA workroom at an elementary school. They should not be used for plastic coated pencils (the ones with pictures typically found in dollar stores), but great for sharpening 100s of pencils at any given time.
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sharpener for 3 months and it no longer works. It was great while it did work, but feels like a waste of money now.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Powerful Pencil Sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sharpener as has every size imaginable as you won't have to worry you can use it for all pencils. Very Powerful Sharpener as well. Great price as I cannot live without this item and it's performance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fast perfect point.
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of the hand sharpener and the point never being right. This works great with all kinds of pencils. Coloring, drawing, writing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett W

customer_reviews.title: Great features until it dies :(
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sharpener... until it died! It lasted about 1.5 school years of regular pencil sharpening in the classroom. My third graders finally killed it this week. The blue light is awesome, but it's too pricey for me to replacing almost annually.
customer_reviews.author: ADP

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens only one side.
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I tried this would only sharpen one side. The wood on the other side went all the way to the tip so you couldn't even write after sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Close

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Great!
customer_reviews.text: After years of buying--and replacing--the under $20 sharpeners for my classroom, I splurged and am so glad I did. First, it's a write-off as it is being used entirely in my classroom. Second, high school students come from all over to use the sharpener in my room. (And yes, that will get old quickly.) With 125 students in my room per day, this sharpener has been working over time. And four months later, it's still going strong. The blue light is great, too, for those passive aggressive students that try to make noise for attention while I'm trying to teach. The second I see the light, their turn is over. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Teachah Lady

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I've waited so long to purchase this. Well, probably because I didn't know about it. I use ALL the colors pencils to color my handmade cards & I've not had an issue with any of them in this sharpener. I've used it with Prisma Color pencils, Derwent InkTense pencils, Prisma VeriThin pencils, Kimberly Watercolor pencils, & Memory Box color pencils. And if course it does a great job on regular #2 pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: Great for home office.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in my home office for over two years. Works great!! We sharpen a lot of pencils. I like that it stops when the pencil is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: B L W

customer_reviews.title: So good we bought two
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a teacher, I'm an artist, we both love this sharpener. Just keep in mind that it is BIG. It will take up a fair amount of desk space, but you also won't be dumping it very often. Aside from being able to sharpen pencils of various sizes, it also has a light that tells you when the pencil is sharp so that you don't over sharpen. Great purchase! We bought two of them. One for her class and one for my studio.
customer_reviews.author: D_Notice

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pencil sharpener I've tried to buy, so I'm getting worn out now. All these positive reviews again and it sharpens pencils at an angle so that the wood goes almost all the way to the tip. It also turns off automatically on you and leave the wood all ragged. This might be a nice feature for a classroom of small children, but it is just annoying for anyone old enough to make up their own mind when a pencil is actually sharp. My old sharpener sharpened pencils much sharper than this model as well.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: X-Acto TeacherPro sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sharpener last October. The classroom sharpeners are really crappy and do not sharpen pencils adequately. I loved this sharpener and I have not let my students use it at all. Unfortunately, it seems that the sensor has malfunctioned and shuts off before the pencil is sharpened. I am not really sure whom to call for support. I have tried to contact X-Acto twice but not heard a thing. It was a great sharpener while it lasted but certainly did not last as long as it advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is horrible! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costly sharpener for my son's in home use. It didnt work well from minute one but I just thought we had to get used to it. Well, no matter what size pencil you put in, the led light never lights up and it will just keep sharpening until you pull the pencil out. On day three the sharpener stopped working altogether. My daughter bought a $20 sharpener that works great. Do not, repeat, do not waste your money on this large sized poorly constructed item!
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sharpener
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sharpener. Fast, not overly loud, and stops automatically (also flashes a blue light when it is done sharpening). My students come to my room throughout the day because they claim it's the best pencil sharpener in the school (4 floor high school with 1000+ students). Would HIGHLY recommend this sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: The Fam Five

customer_reviews.title: Optimal Electric Sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Yet it is a teacher's edition of electric sharpener. It also a good one for home. Here are the Pros and Cons. Pros: Great size for the price. It hold more pencil waste then most electric sharpener. It also has a light indicator to show pencil is finish sharping. 6 available size sharpener. 10 year warranty. Cons: Waste bin is not easy to open. The indent part of the waste bin is smooth and has no pull latch.However it not that bad from preventing little five year old touchy finger from opening it. Conclusion: So far a great sharpener in class and home.
customer_reviews.author: review_this&that

customer_reviews.title: Best Sharpener We''ve Owned
customer_reviews.text: With two small kids in the house we go through a lot of pencils. Time after time we've purchased sharpeners that have all bitten the dust quickly. Not the case with this one. It's awesome. I'm looking at it half full of shavings thinking it's time to write this review. The shaving catch bin is huge. You rarely have to empty it. It quickly sharpens pencils to a super sharp point. We only use one or two of the sizes it's capable of sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Tom's 3D Glasses

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten-worthy
customer_reviews.text: Great sharpener for my kindergartners. A blue light shines to show the child that the pencil is sharp. Line moves quickly, pencils work longer because sharpener cuts straighter and exposes an even amount of graphite around the pencil. The shavings bin is big so it doesn't have to be emptied often. I'd definitely buy this sharpener again.
customer_reviews.author: JRMason

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: This is much bigger than the one I have at home, a 18xx BS model which is great. It was for my kids teacher as hers broke. Big, heavy duty, looks nice and there is a light goes on when the pencil is sharp. Different sizes.... A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: Garage Rat

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and very fast. I just got this for my classroom and am very happy with it. I like that it lights up to tell you your pencils are sharpened. Sharpens even brand new pencils in seconds and makes them very sharp. Would highly recommend for anyone, but especially for teachers.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. A student managed to sharpen his pencil up to the metal crimp and lost it inside the grinding turrets, grr. I couldn't take it apart, a total loss. BUT, I love how reliable and quick this pencil sharpener is.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Neumann

customer_reviews.title: More power....
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. For years we used a small battery powered manual. It was horrendous trying to get that to work. Gold deal on the X-ACTO product made me finally pull the trigger. This thing is amazing and works as expected. I got this edition over the other one as per X-ACTO's web site, this motor is rated a 16 versus the several dollar cheaper one which is rated a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST pencil sharpener! I've bought two: one for my classroom and one for home. Plus, the price is half what you will pay retail!👍🏻 The blue light lets you know when it's perfectly sharpened, too. It's even easy for my pre-k students to use. Now, we never have a broken or dull pencils in our classroom or at home anymore. It's great for small colored pencils, too. Just rotate the dail to match the pencils' width. It's perfect!😍 Makes a great Teacher's Gift, too.
customer_reviews.author: Livelovelaugh99

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I use pencils all of the time because I am a music teacher and you never, ever want to write on your music with pen! Also, I have a thing for sharp pencils so I sharpen my pencils often. I have gone through several pencil sharpeners that just didn't cut it. This one is great so far. The point comes out consistently sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Music Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product....perfect for my math classroom where pencil sharpening is a must! Very quiet and fast! Love the led light that lights up when its finished sharpening! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bruening

customer_reviews.title: it was supposed to be assembled with TWO steel cutters ...
customer_reviews.text: it was supposed to be assembled with TWO steel cutters per the manufacturers website but it only has one cutter and a counter weight.
customer_reviews.author: courtney hawkinson

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: At work we had all these pencils that weren't sharpened. We would use steak knives to whittle them down to create a sharp point, exposing the graphite. Fast forward to after purchasing this sharpener. Holy moly we have saved so much time! This is a real game changer.
customer_reviews.author: a4wendzi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: As an elementary school teacher who constantly needs pencils to be sharpened by students who are not always careful with classroom equipment, I learned quickly that X-Acto is the premium brand that best serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teacher last school year and she LOVED IT. It has had to withstand misuse and the horrors of high school and it came out strong once the year had ended. Sturdy and reliable and left pencils with a point. Great pencil sharpener for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Zeski

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: Works well, my kids misplace pencils & the ones they find in the pencil drawer are always unsharpened or new. We have an old manual pencil sharpener in the garage, this one is on the desk & easier for them to use themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Prislee

customer_reviews.title: They don't work sharpening pencils after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I paid an amount of money for the this classroom pencil sharpener expecting it to at least last through the year. This is the second sharpener in two years that stop sharpening pencils halfway through the year. I buy the Ticonderoga pencils, which is the World's best pencil in my opinion, and still they don't work. I am truly disappointed. I wish that I had the old fashioned non-electric sharpeners!!
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: We had it a month and it stopped working. Too much money spent for it to be broken in a month
customer_reviews.author: Judith W Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy - the blue light comes on when the pencil has a sharp point, and since this is the model my kids have at school they know to stop when they see the light. Very well made and packaged. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Its fast and it sharpens like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Used up several electric pencil sharpeners that burn out within a year. This one is fast and the light turns on to indicate when the pencil is sharp. Motor seems stronger than other X-Acto electric sharpeners I have bought, and so far the blade is doing what its supposed to do -sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: Moi Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love this sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I would say this the third sharpener that I bought for kids, the previous 2 were terrible did not last the school year. This one give you sharp cut without breaking the pencil, with the light indicator is great function to tell you when to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Mahdi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom and also for my bestfriends classroom. It works with both my students (middle schoolers) and her students (elementary students).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mc

customer_reviews.title: Best Pencil Sharpener!!
customer_reviews.text: Best pencil sharpener! I have two in my classroom and love it so I bought one for at home!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Yulich

product_meta.title: X-ACTO Electric Pencil Sharpener | Teacher Pro Pencil Sharpener for Classrooms, Quiet Electric Motor, Adjustable to Six Pencil Sizes
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueEngineered and designed specifically for classroom use, the X-ACTO TeacherPro Classroom Electric Pencil Sharpener combines smart sharpening technology with rugged construction for dependable performance. This sharpener utilizes a flyaway helical cutter to efficiently sharpen pencils to safe, rounded tips without oversharpening. A powerful and quiet electric motor delivers reliable sharpening power without disruption, while an Auto-Reset feature prevents overheating and possible damage. SmartStop techonology automatically shuts off the motor when pencils are fully sharpened. Adjustable for six pencil sizes, the X-ACTO TeacherPro Classroom Electric Pencil Sharpener is made to reliably serve large classrooms.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER





The X-ACTO TeacherPro Electric Sharpener was created and designed especially for the classroom.

The X-ACTO TeacherPro is one of X-ACTO's most frequently used electric pencil sharpener models. It's built with X-ACTO's patented SmartStop feature which indicates when the pencil is sharpened--so kids aren't so likely to spend extra time at the sharpener, grinding their pencils down to the nub. The TeacherPro is safe, fast, and sharpens quietly to reduce classroom disruption.



Perfect for the classroom, the TeacherPro is fast, safe, and quiet

X-ACTO QUALITY FOR MAXIMUM PRECISION
Only X-ACTO pencil sharpeners feature genuine X-ACTO hardened steel cutters for maximum precision. So you get industry-leading durability and a perfect point every time. X-ACTO's electric pencil sharpeners are engineered for smooth, quiet operation. X-ACTO electric pencil sharpeners are crafted from the highest quality materials, producing the reliability and performance you come to expect from X-ACTO. These electric sharpeners feature carbon steel sharpened blades and sturdy construction.









EXTRA LARGE SHAVINGS RECEPTACLE
The TeacherPro is flexible and comes equipped with an extra large shavings receptacle and multi-hole pencil dial to accommodate a diversity of pencil sizes from fatter pencils for early writers to a more traditional, slimmer style.

X-ACTO sharpeners can handle a variety of different pencils, such as composite pencils, hardwood pencils, and more.

PUT THE "SHHH" IN SHARPENER
X-ACTO's line of electric pencil sharpeners also feature heavy duty, quiet running motors, guaranteeing a precise, clean cut that won't cause a disturbance around the office or classroom.



WHICH X-ACTO SCHOOL/COMMERCIAL PENCIL SHARPENER IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
feature_bullets: Heavy duty electric pencil sharpener designed specifically for classrooms
Durable construction stands up to wear and tear
Quiet electric motor provides reliable power with minimal disruption
Flyaway cutter system stops cutter automatically when pencil is sharp
Helical steel cutter produces safe, rounded pencil points

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,520 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
